subject: Phase 2 cs61b?
content: Hi, I didn't know where else to ask butI am planning on enrolling in a history class, math 1b, econ 2, and cs61b and so far it seems like I should phase 2 cs61b. What do you think?

threads.content: Yes, Phase 2 CS 61B - it is extremely easy to get into (assuming you're a freshman and either L&S undeclared or EECS)

Next time you could ask in EECS 101 Piazza, too (in fact, this question has been asked a lot of times). Echoing student's answer, from what I know and have seen and heard, CS 61B tends to be a relatively safe class to Phase 2 into.
